headline: AI-Related Fears Seen as Overstated; Cantor Reaffirms Salesforce (CRM) Rating
summary: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the AI Stocks Investors Are Watching. On November 12, Cantor Fitzgerald maintained its “Overweight” rating on the stock with a price target of $325.00. The firm’s bullish outlook is driven by its solid free cash flow outlook and overall long-term growth prospects. Cantor believes that Salesforce boasts a robust position […]

headline: Does Salesforce’s Recent Leadership Shakeup Signal a Shift in Value for 2025?
summary: Wondering if Salesforce is a bargain or already priced for perfection? If you are curious about where the real value lies, you are not alone. Despite a slight dip of 1.9% over the last week and 2.5% across the past month, the stock is still up an impressive 65.4% over three years, though it has dropped 28.3% year-to-date. Recently, Salesforce has made headlines thanks to prominent leadership changes and strategic acquisitions. These developments are sparking fresh debate about its long-term...

headline: Salesforce Completes Acquisition of Informatica
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, November 18, 2025--Salesforce (NYSE: CRM), the world’s #1 AI CRM, today announced it has completed its acquisition of Informatica, a leader in enterprise AI-powered cloud data management. The close of the acquisition brings Informatica’s rich data catalog, integration, governance, quality and privacy, metadata management, and Master Data Management (MDM) services to the Salesforce platform, establishing a unified and comprehensive data foundation for agentic AI — and enabling AI a
